name: Lo-fi Cats
description:
Make sleeping cats dance to lo-fi music..

Click the play button once the game has loaded to play..

Controls:  

Down  arrow- Move 

Left arrow- Spin Left

Right arrow – Spin Right 

Space key-  Auto Spin

A key – Go to random spot

D key – Return to middle of the screen.

Credits

Thanks to k-a-r-m-a for the music and Thanks to Fontmeme for the fonts.
